QuestData.Title: Legacy of the Apexis
QuestData.Description: The Apexis are long gone, but their legacy lies preserved in ancient chambers beneath Arak.$B$BLegions of dormant constructs; crystals flush with solar energy; magical techniques lost to the ages - the Apexis left behind caches of immense power, which the Adherents of Rukhmar have begun to unearth.$B$BBring me the cores of the re-activated constructs patrolling the excavation site. Those crystals are the basis of Apexis technology, and the key to our enemy's devastating power.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather $1oa Solar Cores from Apexis Guardians.
QuestData.CompletionText: The Apexis had every advantage, and yet they vanished. What could have happened?
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent. With these we can begin to understand.
